channel.title: Timothy Lin
channel.description: Personal website and blog for Tim Lin

item.title: A Defense and Attack of Julia
item.description:
Recently, I was discussing a slow computational problem with some colleagues where they needed to use MATLAB to develop, but the solution was too slow to compute for any meaningfully sized inputs. When Julia was suggested, it was passed off as a meme, so I felt obligated to talk about why I choose to use Julia.
Read more
